scripts.generate: npm run codegen && npm run protogen
scripts.deploy-local: graph create --node http://${LOCAL_GRAPH_NODE_HOSTNAME:-localhost}:8020/ my_project && graph deploy --node http://${LOCAL_GRAPH_NODE_HOSTNAME:-localhost}:8020/ --ipfs http://${LOCAL_IPFS_HOSTNAME:-localhost}:5001 my_project --version-label=v0.0.1
scripts.protogen: buf generate --type="substreams.v1.program.Data" ../my-project-v0.1.0.spkg#format=bin; echo ''; echo '^^^ You can safely ignore warnings about "non-conform Protobuf generation specification": they come from the assemblyscript buf plugin'; echo ''
